prepares to open the first dealership in Los Angeles Monday and deliver the first batch of special edition Prima Edizione Fiat 500s next month. Sergio Marchionne , CEO of both Chrysler and Fiat, said the Fiat 500 doesn't have ambitions to conquer the U.S. market. It was designed for select areas. Volumes are small. Of 120,000 units to be built annually at Chrysler's Toluca, Mexico, plant, half are for North America and the rest are bound for Brazil and China. The

One of Jay Cutler 's biggest concerns will be avoiding mistakes, and Packers cornerback Tramon Williams has been forcing plenty of them. `` I believe, as Americans have believed since the American founding, that firearms in the hands of law-abiding citizens make communities safer, not less safe,'' Mike Pence , R-Ind., said in an interview. And I understand the human impulse is to look for blame. Heartache does that. But no expressed opinion and no public policy created what happened on Saturday last. In recent years, mass shootings have not generated momentum for new gun laws. American soldiers tortured and humiliated their Iraqi detainees. In a rare concession, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview with Diane Sawyer on`` Nightline'' that he should have stepped down following Abu Ghraib. That was such a stain on our country; to think that people in our custody were treated in that disgusting and perverted and ghastly way, unacceptable way, he said.`` There wasn't an easy target. was going to take time for everything to come together under the leadership of Allen Iverson . Try two games. Allen Iverson had 28 points and 13 assists in Denver's 116-105 victory over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. I'd say we're real comfortable with him now, said Reggie Evans , who had 14 points and 14 rebounds coming off the bench.
